decimals(address,address).details: Will revert with `FeedNotFound` if no feed is found for the given base and quote

returns._0: The number of decimals in the response

description(address,address).details: Will revert with `FeedNotFound` if no feed is found for the given base and quote

returns._0: The description of the underlying aggregator

getFeedProxy(address,address).details: Will revert with `FeedNotFound` if no feed is found for the given base and quote

latestRoundData(address,address).details: Will revert with `FeedNotFound` if no feed is found for the given base and quote

returns._2: Timestamp of when the round started
returns._3: Timestamp of when the round was updated
returns._4: The round ID of the round in which the answer was computed

setFeedProxies((address,address,address).details: A feed's address could be set to the zero address to delete a feed

version(address,address).details: Will revert with `FeedNotFound` if no feed is found for the given base and quote

returns._0: The version of the type of aggregator

FeedNotFound().notice: Thrown when trying to execute a call with a base and quote that don't have a feed assigned

ZeroAddress().notice: Thrown when one of the parameters is a zero address

decimals(address,address).notice: Returns the number of decimals present in the response value.

description(address,address).notice: Returns the description of the underlying aggregator that the proxy points to.

getFeedProxy(address,address).notice: Returns the proxy feed for a specific quote and base

latestRoundData(address,address).notice: Returns the version representing the type of aggregator the proxy points to.

setFeedProxies((address,address,address).notice: Sets or deletes feeds for specific quotes and bases

version(address,address).notice: Returns the version representing the type of aggregator the proxy points to.
